00055 CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter()
00056 {
00057         m_BufferSize = 0; 
00058         m_MaxBufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00059 }
00060 
00061 CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::~CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter()
00062 {
00063         FlushBuffer();
00064         Cleanup();
00065 }
00066 
00067 static void ClearBuffer(std::vector< std::vector<char *> > &buffers, std::vector<int> &rowIndexes)
00068 {
00069         for (int target=0; target<(int)buffers.size(); target++) 
00070         { 
00071                 int nbufs = (int) buffers[target].size();
00072                 for (int ibuf=0; ibuf < nbufs; ibuf++)
00073                 {
00074                         delete[] buffers[target][ibuf];
00075             buffers[target][ibuf] = NULL;
00076                 }
00077                 buffers[target].clear();
00078         }
00079         buffers.clear();
00080         rowIndexes.clear();
00081 }
00082 
00083 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::Cleanup()
00084 {
00085     std::map<MultiDataType, std::vector< std::vector<char *> > >::iterator it;
00086     std::map<MultiDataType, std::vector<int> >::iterator rit;
00087     for (rit = rowIndexes.begin(), it = dataBuffers.begin(); rit != rowIndexes.end() && it != dataBuffers.end(); rit++, it++)
00088     {
00089         ClearBuffer(it->second, rit->second);
00090     }
00091     rowIndexes.clear();
00092     dataBuffers.clear();
00093     dataBufferSz.clear();
00094 }

00096 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::Initialize(vector<string> *CHPFileNames, std::vector<MultiDataType> &dataTypes, std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxProbeSetNmLn)
00097 {
00098     std::map<MultiDataType, int> empty;
00099     Initialize(CHPFileNames, dataTypes, maxProbeSetNmLn, empty, empty, empty, empty, empty, empty, empty);
00100 }

00102 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::Initialize(vector<string> *CHPFileNames,
00103                                                                                           vector<MultiDataType> &dataTypes,
00104                                               map<MultiDataType, int> &maxSegmentTypeLn,
00105                                               map<MultiDataType, int> &maxReferenceSegmentIDLn,
00106                                               map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialSegmentIDLn,
00107                                                                                           map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialARRIDLn,
00108                                                                                           map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialCHPIDLn,
00109                                                                                           map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn,
00110                                                                                           map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialRoleLn
00111 )
00112 {
00113     std::map<MultiDataType, int> empty;
00114     Initialize(CHPFileNames,
00115         dataTypes,
00116         empty,
00117         maxSegmentTypeLn,
00118         maxReferenceSegmentIDLn,
00119         maxFamilialSegmentIDLn,
00120         maxFamilialARRIDLn,
00121         maxFamilialCHPIDLn,
00122         maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn,
00123         maxFamilialRoleLn);
00124 }
00125 
00126 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::Initialize
00127 (
00128     std::vector<std::string> *CHPFileNames,
00129     std::vector<MultiDataType> &dataTypes,
00130     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxProbeSetNmLn,
00131     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxSegmentTypeLn,
00132     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxReferenceSegmentIDLn,
00133     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialSegmentIDLn,         
00134     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialARRIDLn,
00135     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialCHPIDLn,
00136     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn,
00137     std::map<MultiDataType, int> &maxFamilialRoleLn
00138 )
00139 {
00140         chpFileNames = CHPFileNames;
00141     maxSegmentType = maxSegmentTypeLn;
00142     maxReferenceSegmentID = maxReferenceSegmentIDLn;
00143     maxFamilialSegmentID = maxFamilialSegmentIDLn;
00144         maxFamilialARRID = maxFamilialARRIDLn;
00145         maxFamilialCHPID = maxFamilialCHPIDLn;
00146         maxFamilialCHPFilename = maxFamilialCHPFilenameLn;
00147         maxFamilialRole = maxFamilialRoleLn;
00148     maxProbeSetNameLength = maxProbeSetNmLn;
00149         Cleanup();
00150         for (int i=0; i<(int)chpFileNames->size(); i++)
00151         {
00152                 for (int itype=0; itype<(int)dataTypes.size(); itype++)
00153                 {
00154                         vector<char*> buffer;
00155             dataBuffers[dataTypes[itype]].push_back(buffer);
00156             rowIndexes[dataTypes[itype]].push_back(0);
00157                 }
00158         }
00159         m_BufferSize = 0;
00160         for (int i=0; i<(int)dataTypes.size(); i++)    
00161         {
00162         dataBufferSz[dataTypes[i]] = 0;
00163         }
00164 }
00165 
00166 // static to keep function local to this file - perhaps this should be a static private member function? -AW
00167 static int GetMetricBufferSize(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics)
00168 {
00169         int bufferSize = 0;
00170         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00171         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00172         {
00173                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00174                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00175                 {
00176                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00177                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt8());
00178                         break;
00179 
00180                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00181                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt8());
00182                         break;
00183 
00184                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00185                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt16());
00186                         break;
00187 
00188                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00189                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt16());
00190                         break;
00191 
00192                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00193                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueInt32());
00194                         break;
00195 
00196                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00197                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueUInt32());
00198                         break;
00199 
00200                 case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00201                         bufferSize += sizeof(nv.GetValueFloat());
00202                         break;
00203 
00204                 case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00205                         bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00206                         bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueAscii().length() * sizeof(char));
00207                         break;
00208 
00209                 case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00210                         bufferSize += sizeof(int);
00211                         bufferSize += (int)(nv.GetValueText().length() * sizeof(wchar_t));
00212                         break;
00213 
00214                 case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00215                         break;
00216                 }
00217         }
00218         return bufferSize;
00219 }
00220 
00221 // static to keep function local to this file - perhaps this should be a static private member function? -AW
00222 static void CopyMetricToBuffer(const std::vector<affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType> &metrics, char * &pbuffer)
00223 {
00224         int ncols = (int) metrics.size();
00225         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00226         {
00227                 const ParameterNameValueType &nv = metrics[icol];
00228                 switch (nv.GetParameterType())
00229                 {
00230                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type:
00231                         *pbuffer = nv.GetValueInt8();
00232                         pbuffer += sizeof(int8_t);
00233                         break;
00234 
00235                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00236                         *pbuffer = nv.GetValueUInt8();
00237                         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int8_t);
00238                         break;
00239 
00240                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type:
00241                         MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt16());
00242                         pbuffer += sizeof(int16_t);
00243                         break;
00244 
00245                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type:
00246                         MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt16());
00247                         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int16_t);
00248                         break;
00249 
00250                 case ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type:
00251                         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueInt32());
00252                         pbuffer += sizeof(int32_t);
00253                         break;
00254 
00255                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type:
00256                         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueUInt32());
00257                         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00258                         break;
00259 
00260                 case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00261                         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, nv.GetValueFloat());
00262                         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00263                         break;
00264 
00265                 case ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType:
00266                         {
00267                                 string s = nv.GetValueAscii();
00268                                 int l = (int) s.length();
00269                                 MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, l);
00270                                 pbuffer += sizeof(int32_t);
00271                                 strcpy(pbuffer, s.c_str());
00272                                 pbuffer += l;
00273                         }
00274                         break;
00275 
00276                 case ParameterNameValueType::TextType:
00277                         // @todo write out wide strings
00278                         assert(0==1);
00279                         break;
00280 
00281                 case ParameterNameValueType::UnknownType:
00282                         break;
00283                 }
00284         }
00285 }
00286 
00287 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry)
00288 {
00289         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00290         {
00291                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.call) + sizeof(entry.confidence) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00292         }
00293         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00294         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00295         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00296         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.name.length());
00297         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00298         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00299         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00300         *pbuffer = entry.call;
00301         pbuffer += sizeof(char);
00302         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.confidence);
00303         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00304         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00305         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00306         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00307 
00308         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00309         {
00310                 FlushBuffer();
00311         }
00312 }
00313 
00314 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataExpressionEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataExpressionData &entry)
00315 {
00316         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00317                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.quantification) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00318         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00319         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00320         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00321         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.name.length());
00322         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00323         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00324         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00325         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.quantification);
00326         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00327         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00328         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00329         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00330 
00331         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00332         {
00333                 FlushBuffer();
00334         }
00335 }

00338 {
00339         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00340                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.chr) + sizeof(entry.position) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00341         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00342         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00343         char *pbuffer = buffer;

00345         pbuffer += sizeof(int);

00347         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00348         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.chr);
00349         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.chr);
00350         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.position);
00351         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.position);

00353         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);

00355 
00356         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00357         {
00358                 FlushBuffer();
00359         }

00387 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const MarkerABSignals &entry)
00388 {
00389         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00390                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = sizeof(entry.index) + sizeof(entry.aSignal) + sizeof(entry.bSignal) + sizeof(entry.scar);
00391         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00392         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00393         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00394 
00395         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.index);
00396         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00397 
00398         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.aSignal);
00399         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00400 
00401         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.bSignal);
00402         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00403 
00404         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.scar);
00405         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00406 
00407         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00408         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00409 
00410         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00411         {
00412                 FlushBuffer();
00413         }
00414 }

00416 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteMultiDataCytoRegionEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData &entry)
00417 {
00418         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00419                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + sizeof(int) + sizeof(entry.chr) +
00420                 sizeof(entry.startPosition) + sizeof(entry.stopPosition) + sizeof(entry.call) +
00421                 sizeof(entry.confidenceScore) + GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00422         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00423         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00424         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00425         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.name.length());
00426         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00427         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00428         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00429         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.chr);
00430         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.chr);
00431         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.startPosition);
00432         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.startPosition);
00433         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.stopPosition);
00434         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.stopPosition);
00435         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.call);
00436         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.call);
00437         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.confidenceScore);
00438         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.confidenceScore);
00439         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00440         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00441         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00442 
00443         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00444         {
00445                 FlushBuffer();
00446         }
00447 }

00478 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const DmetBiAllelicData &entry)
00479 {
00480         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00481         {
00482                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + 
00483                                                                                                 sizeof(int) + 
00484                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.call) + 
00485                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.confidence) + 
00486                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.force) + 
00487                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalA) + 
00488                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalB) + 
00489                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextA) + 
00490                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextB) + 
00491                                                                                                 GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00492         }
00493         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00494         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00495         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00496         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)pbuffer, entry.name.length());
00497         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00498         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00499         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00500         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.call);
00501         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.call);
00502         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.confidence);
00503         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.confidence);
00504         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.force);
00505         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.force);
00506         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalA);
00507         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalA);
00508         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalB);
00509         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalB);
00510         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextA);
00511         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextA);
00512         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextB);
00513         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextB);
00514         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00515         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00516         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00517         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00518         {
00519                 FlushBuffer();
00520         }
00521 }

00523 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const DmetMultiAllelicData &entry)
00524 {
00525         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00526         {
00527                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + 
00528                                                                                                 sizeof(int) + 
00529                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.call) + 
00530                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.confidence) + 
00531                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.force) + 
00532                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.alleleCount) + 
00533                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalA) + 
00534                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalB) + 
00535                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalC) + 
00536                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalD) + 
00537                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalE) + 
00538                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.signalF) + 
00539                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextA) + 
00540                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextB) + 
00541                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextC) + 
00542                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextD) + 
00543                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextE) + 
00544                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.contextF) + 
00545                                                                                                 GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00546         }
00547         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00548         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00549         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00550         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.name.length());
00551         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00552         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00553         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00554         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.call);
00555         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.call);
00556         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.confidence);
00557         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.confidence);
00558         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.force);
00559         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.force);
00560         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.alleleCount);
00561         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.alleleCount);
00562         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalA);
00563         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalA);
00564         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalB);
00565         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalB);
00566         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalC);
00567         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalC);
00568         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalD);
00569         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalD);
00570         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalE);
00571         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalE);
00572         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.signalF);
00573         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.signalF);
00574         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextA);
00575         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextA);
00576         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextB);
00577         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextB);
00578         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextC);
00579         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextC);
00580         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextD);
00581         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextD);
00582         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextE);
00583         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextE);
00584         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*)pbuffer, entry.contextF);
00585         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.contextF);
00586         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00587         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00588         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00589         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00590         {
00591                 FlushBuffer();
00592         }
00593 }
00594 
00595 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const DmetCopyNumberData &entry)
00596 {
00597         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00598         {
00599                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] + 
00600                                                                                                 sizeof(int) + 
00601                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.call) + 
00602                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.confidence) + 
00603                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.force) + 
00604                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.estimate) + 
00605                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.lower) + 
00606                                                                                                 sizeof(entry.upper) + 
00607                                                                                                 GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00608         }
00609         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00610         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00611         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00612         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*)pbuffer, entry.name.length());
00613         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00614         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.name.c_str(), entry.name.length());
00615         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00616         MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t*)pbuffer, entry.call);
00617         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.call);
00618         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.confidence);
00619         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.confidence);
00620         MmSetUInt16_N((uint16_t*)pbuffer, entry.force);
00621         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.force);
00622         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.estimate);
00623         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.estimate);
00624         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.lower);
00625         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.lower);
00626         MmSetFloat_N((float*)pbuffer, entry.upper);
00627         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.upper);
00628         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00629         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00630         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00631         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00632         {
00633                 FlushBuffer();
00634         }
00635 }
00636 
00637 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeMultiDataSummaryData & entry)
00638 {
00639         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00640         {
00641                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = 
00642             sizeof(entry.chr) +
00643                         sizeof(int) + 
00644                         maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType] +
00645                         sizeof(entry.startIndex) +
00646                         sizeof(entry.markerCount) +
00647             sizeof(entry.minSignal) +
00648             sizeof(entry.maxSignal) +
00649             sizeof(entry.medianCnState) +
00650             sizeof(entry.homFrequency) +
00651             sizeof(entry.hetFrequency) +
00652                         GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00653         }
00654         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00655         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00656         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00657 
00658     MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*) pbuffer, entry.chr);
00659         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int8_t);
00660 
00661         MmSetUInt32_N((u_int32_t *)pbuffer, entry.display.length());
00662         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00663 
00664         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.display.c_str(), entry.display.length());
00665         pbuffer += maxProbeSetNameLength[dataType];
00666 
00667         MmSetUInt32_N((u_int32_t *)pbuffer, entry.startIndex);
00668         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00669 
00670         MmSetUInt32_N((u_int32_t *)pbuffer, entry.markerCount);
00671         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00672 
00673         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.minSignal);
00674         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00675 
00676         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.maxSignal);
00677         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00678 
00679         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.medianCnState);
00680         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00681 
00682         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.homFrequency);
00683         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00684 
00685         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.hetFrequency);
00686         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00687 
00688         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00689 
00690         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00691         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00692 
00693         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00694         {
00695                 FlushBuffer();
00696         }
00697 }

00699 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeSegmentData & entry)
00700 {
00701         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00702         {
00703                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = 
00704                         sizeof(entry.segmentId) +
00705             sizeof(entry.chr) +
00706             sizeof(entry.startPosition) +
00707             sizeof(entry.stopPosition) +
00708                         sizeof(entry.markerCount) +
00709             sizeof(entry.meanMarkerDistance) +
00710             GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics);
00711         }
00712 
00713         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00714         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00715         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00716 
00717         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.segmentId);
00718         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.segmentId);
00719 
00720         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.chr);
00721         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.chr);
00722 
00723         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.startPosition);
00724         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.startPosition);
00725 
00726         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.stopPosition);
00727         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.stopPosition);
00728 
00729         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.markerCount);
00730         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.markerCount);
00731 
00732         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.meanMarkerDistance);
00733         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.meanMarkerDistance);
00734 
00735         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00736 
00737         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00738         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00739 
00740         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00741         {
00742                 FlushBuffer();
00743         }
00744 }

00746 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ChromosomeSegmentDataEx & entry)
00747 {
00748         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00749         {
00750                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = 
00751             sizeof(entry.segmentId) + 
00752             sizeof(entry.chr) +
00753             sizeof(entry.startPosition) +
00754             sizeof(entry.stopPosition) +
00755             sizeof(entry.call) +
00756             sizeof(entry.confidence) +
00757             sizeof(entry.markerCount) +
00758             GetMetricBufferSize(entry.metrics) +
00759                         sizeof(entry.referenceSampleKey) +
00760                         sizeof(entry.familialSampleKey) +
00761                         sizeof(entry.homozygosity) +
00762                         sizeof(entry.heterozygosity);
00763         }
00764 
00765         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00766         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00767         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00768 
00769         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.segmentId);
00770         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.segmentId);
00771 
00772         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.referenceSampleKey);
00773         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.referenceSampleKey);
00774 
00775         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.familialSampleKey);
00776         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.familialSampleKey);
00777 
00778         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.chr);
00779         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.chr);
00780 
00781         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.startPosition);
00782         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.startPosition);
00783 
00784         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.stopPosition);
00785         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.stopPosition);
00786 
00787         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t *)pbuffer, entry.call);
00788         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.call);
00789 
00790         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.confidence);
00791         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.confidence);
00792 
00793     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, entry.markerCount);
00794         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.markerCount);
00795 
00796         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.homozygosity);
00797         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.homozygosity);
00798 
00799         MmSetFloat_N((float *)pbuffer, entry.heterozygosity);
00800         pbuffer += sizeof(entry.heterozygosity);
00801 
00802         CopyMetricToBuffer(entry.metrics, pbuffer);
00803 
00804         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00805         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00806 
00807         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00808         {
00809                 FlushBuffer();
00810         }
00811 }
00812 
00813 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const affymetrix_calvin_data::FamilialSample& entry)
00814 {
00815         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00816         {
00817                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = 
00818                         sizeof(entry.sampleKey) +
00819             sizeof(int) +
00820             maxFamilialARRID[dataType] + 
00821             sizeof(int) +
00822             maxFamilialCHPID[dataType] + 
00823             sizeof(int) +
00824             (2*maxFamilialCHPFilename[dataType]) + 
00825             sizeof(int) +
00826             maxFamilialRole[dataType] + 
00827             sizeof(entry.roleConfidence) +
00828             sizeof(u_int8_t);
00829         }
00830         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00831         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00832         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00833 
00834 
00835     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) pbuffer, entry.sampleKey);
00836         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00837 
00838         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxFamilialARRID[dataType]);
00839         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00840 
00841         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.arrID.c_str(), entry.arrID.length());
00842         pbuffer += maxFamilialARRID[dataType];
00843 
00844         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxFamilialCHPID[dataType]);
00845         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00846 
00847         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.chpID.c_str(), entry.chpID.length());
00848         pbuffer += maxFamilialCHPID[dataType];
00849 
00850         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxFamilialCHPFilename[dataType]);
00851         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00852 
00853     for (int ilen=0; ilen<(int)entry.chpFilename.length(); ilen++)
00854     {
00855         u_int16_t cvalue = (u_int16_t) entry.chpFilename[ilen];
00856         cvalue = htons(cvalue);
00857         memcpy((u_int16_t *)(pbuffer+ilen*sizeof(u_int16_t)), &cvalue, sizeof(u_int16_t));
00858     }
00859         //memcpy(pbuffer, entry.chpFilename.c_str(), 2*entry.chpFilename.length());
00860         pbuffer += (2*maxFamilialCHPFilename[dataType]);
00861 
00862 
00863         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxFamilialRole[dataType]);
00864         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00865 
00866         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.role.c_str(), entry.role.length());
00867         pbuffer += maxFamilialRole[dataType];
00868 
00869         MmSetUInt8((uint8_t*) pbuffer, (entry.roleValidity == true ? 1 : 0));
00870         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int8_t);
00871 
00872     MmSetFloat_N((float*) pbuffer, entry.roleConfidence);
00873         pbuffer += sizeof(float);
00874 
00875         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00876         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00877 
00878         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00879         {
00880                 FlushBuffer();
00881         }
00882 }
00883 
00884 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::WriteEntry(MultiDataType dataType, int target, const affymetrix_calvin_data::FamilialSegmentOverlap & entry)
00885 {
00886         if (dataBufferSz[dataType] == 0)
00887         {
00888                 dataBufferSz[dataType] = 
00889             sizeof(int) +
00890             maxSegmentType[dataType] + 
00891             sizeof(int) +
00892             maxReferenceSegmentID[dataType] + 
00893             sizeof(int) +
00894             maxFamilialSegmentID[dataType] + 
00895             sizeof(entry.referenceSampleKey) +
00896             sizeof(entry.familialSampleKey);
00897         }
00898         char *buffer = new char[dataBufferSz[dataType]];
00899         memset(buffer, 0, dataBufferSz[dataType]);
00900         char *pbuffer = buffer;
00901 
00902     
00903         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxSegmentType[dataType]);
00904         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00905 
00906         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.segmentType.c_str(), entry.segmentType.length());
00907         pbuffer += maxSegmentType[dataType];
00908 
00909     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) pbuffer, entry.referenceSampleKey);
00910         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00911 
00912         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxReferenceSegmentID[dataType]);
00913         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00914 
00915         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.referenceSegmentID.c_str(), entry.referenceSegmentID.length());
00916         pbuffer += maxReferenceSegmentID[dataType];
00917 
00918     MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t*) pbuffer, entry.familialSampleKey);
00919         pbuffer += sizeof(u_int32_t);
00920 
00921         MmSetUInt32_N((uint32_t *)pbuffer, maxFamilialSegmentID[dataType]);
00922         pbuffer += sizeof(int);
00923 
00924         memcpy(pbuffer, entry.familialSegmentID.c_str(), entry.familialSegmentID.length());
00925         pbuffer += maxFamilialSegmentID[dataType];
00926 
00927         dataBuffers[dataType][target].push_back(buffer);
00928         m_BufferSize += dataBufferSz[dataType];
00929 
00930         if (m_BufferSize > m_MaxBufferSize)
00931         {
00932                 FlushBuffer();
00933         }
00934 }
00935 
00936 static void ClearBuffer(std::vector<char *> &buffer)
00937 {
00938     int nbufs = (int) buffer.size();
00939     for (int ibuf=0; ibuf<nbufs; ibuf++)
00940     {
00941         delete[] buffer[ibuf];
00942         buffer[ibuf] = NULL;
00943     }
00944     buffer.clear();
00945 }
00946 
00947 void CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter::FlushBuffer()
00948 {
00949         if(m_BufferSize > 0)
00950         {
00951                 MultiDataType segmentTypes[] = {
00952                         SegmentCNMultiDataType,
00953                         SegmentLOHMultiDataType,
00954                         SegmentCNNeutralLOHMultiDataType,
00955                         SegmentNormalDiploidMultiDataType,
00956                         SegmentMosaicismMultiDataType,
00957                         SegmentNoCallMultiDataType,
00958                         SegmentGenotypeConcordanceMultiDataType,
00959                         SegmentGenotypeDiscordanceMultiDataType,
00960                         SegmentCNLossLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00961                         SegmentCNNeutralLOHConcordanceMultiDataType,
00962                         SegmentHeteroUPDMultiDataType,
00963                         SegmentIsoUPDMultiDataType,
00964                         SegmentDenovoCopyNumberMultiDataType,
00965                         SegmentHemizygousParentOfOriginMultiDataType
00966                 };
00967                 int nSegmentTypes = sizeof(segmentTypes) / sizeof(MultiDataType);
00968 
00969                 for (int target = 0; target < (int)chpFileNames->size(); target++)
00970                 {
00971                         CalvinCHPFileUpdater updater;
00972                         updater.OpenCHPFile((*chpFileNames)[target].c_str());
00973             MultiDataType dataType;
00974 
00975             dataType = GenotypeMultiDataType;
00976                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
00977                         {
00978                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataGenotypeEntryBuffer(dataType,
00979                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
00980                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
00981                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
00982                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
00983                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
00984                         }
00985 
00986             dataType = CopyNumberMultiDataType;
00987                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
00988                         {
00989                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataCopyNumberEntryBuffer(dataType,
00990                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
00991                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
00992                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
00993                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
00994                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
00995                         }
00996 
00997             dataType = CytoMultiDataType;
00998                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
00999                         {
01000                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataCytoRegionEntryBuffer(dataType,
01001                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01002                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01003                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01004                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01005                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01006                         }
01007 
01008             dataType = ExpressionMultiDataType;
01009                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01010                         {
01011                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataExpressionEntryBuffer(dataType,
01012                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01013                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01014                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01015                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01016                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01017                         }
01018 
01019             dataType = CopyNumberVariationMultiDataType;
01020                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01021                         {
01022                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataCopyNumberVariationRegionEntryBuffer(dataType,
01023                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01024                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01025                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01026                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01027                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01028                         }
01029 
01030             dataType = DmetBiAllelicMultiDataType;
01031                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01032                         {
01033                                 updater.UpdateDmetBiAllelicEntryBuffer(dataType,
01034                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01035                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01036                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01037                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01038                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01039                         }
01040 
01041             dataType = DmetMultiAllelicMultiDataType;
01042                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01043                         {
01044                                 updater.UpdateDmetMultiAllelicEntryBuffer(dataType,
01045                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01046                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01047                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01048                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01049                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01050                         }
01051 
01052             dataType = DmetCopyNumberMultiDataType;
01053                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01054                         {
01055                                 updater.UpdateDmetCopyNumberEntryBuffer(dataType,
01056                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01057                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01058                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01059                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01060                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01061                         }
01062 
01063             dataType = ChromosomeSummaryMultiDataType;
01064                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01065                         {
01066                                 updater.UpdateChromosomeSummaryEntryBuffer(dataType,
01067                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01068                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01069                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01070                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01071                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01072                         }
01073 
01074                         for (int iseg=0; iseg<nSegmentTypes; iseg++)
01075                         {
01076                                 dataType = segmentTypes[iseg];
01077                                 if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01078                                 {
01079                                         updater.UpdateChromosomeSegmentEntryBuffer(dataType,
01080                                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01081                                                 dataBufferSz[dataType],
01082                                                 dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01083                                         rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01084                                         ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01085                                 }
01086                         }
01087 
01088             dataType = FamilialSegmentOverlapsMultiDataType;
01089                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01090                         {
01091                 updater.UpdateFamilialSegmentOverlapEntryBuffer(dataType,
01092                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01093                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01094                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01095                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01096                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01097                         }
01098 
01099             dataType = FamilialSamplesMultiDataType;
01100                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01101                         {
01102                 updater.UpdateFamilialSampleEntryBuffer(dataType,
01103                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01104                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01105                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01106                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01107                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01108                         }
01109 
01110             dataType = AllelePeaksMultiDataType;
01111                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01112                         {
01113                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataAllelePeaksEntryBuffer(dataType,
01114                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01115                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01116                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01117                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01118                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01119                         }
01120 
01121             dataType = MarkerABSignalsMultiDataType;
01122                         if (dataBuffers.find(dataType) != dataBuffers.end() && dataBuffers[dataType][target].size() > 0)
01123                         {
01124                                 updater.UpdateMultiDataMarkerABSignalsEntryBuffer(dataType,
01125                     rowIndexes[dataType][target],
01126                     dataBufferSz[dataType],
01127                     dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01128                                 rowIndexes[dataType][target] += (int) dataBuffers[dataType][target].size();
01129                 ClearBuffer(dataBuffers[dataType][target]);
01130                         }
01131 
01132                         updater.CloseCHPFile();
01133                 }
01134         }
01135         m_BufferSize = 0;
01136 }
